name: acf-json-tree-view
description: Shows ACF field group titles with enhanced tree view

scripts.package: pnpm run generate-enums && vite build --mode production && vsce package --pre-release

commands.title: Generate New Keys for All Fields

acfJsonTreeView.iconRules.description: Custom icon rules for field groups

condition.description: Condition for when this rule applies. Can use simple conditions or combine with AND/OR logic.

titleContains.description: Field group title must contain this string (case-insensitive)

locationParam.description: Field group must have this location parameter

and.description: All conditions in this array must match (logical AND). Each item is a condition object.

or.description: At least one condition in this array must match (logical OR). Each item is a condition object.

icon.description: Icon name to display. Choose from 368 available VS Code icons.

color.description: Theme color ID for the icon. Choose from 104 available theme colors.

typeLabel.description: Label to show as field group type

acfJsonTreeView.ignoreThemes.description: List of theme names to ignore in the tree view

acfJsonTreeView.showOverrideIndicator.description: Show indicator for field group overrides

acfJsonTreeView.overrideIcon.description: Icon to display for field group overrides

acfJsonTreeView.overrideColor.description: Theme color ID for override indicator

acfJsonTreeView.themeIcon.description: Icon to display for theme folders

acfJsonTreeView.themeColor.description: Theme color ID for theme folder
